heading: Hans Törnquist
mainBody: I have spent more than two decades designing and building digital products for airlines, banks and commerce brands. My work moves between solution architecture and hands-on engineering, covering React interfaces, Node.js and .NET services, container platforms and the automation that keeps them running. I enjoy taking complicated legacy estates, breaking the work into pragmatic steps and leading teams through the change so the organisation sees results quickly. The projects below show how I balance architecture, delivery and mentoring to keep platforms secure, observable and easy for developers to evolve.
